beer.name: Brutal Bitter
beer.description: An Imperial bitter with exotic traditional floor malts, citrusy, hoppy flavor, stupendous hop aroma.
beer.grains: 100% Floor-malted Maris Otter, Cara Vienna, Cara Wheat.
100% Floor-malted Maris Otter, Cara Vienna, Cara Wheat.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
